title: Create a data policy
description: Creates a data policy in the BigQuery Data Policy API that applies a predefined data masking rule to a specified data column.

objective.narrative: Developers need to protect sensitive data (such as PII) in a BigQuery table without completely restricting access. This sample demonstrates how to programmatically create a data policy to apply a mask (for example, hashing or nullifying the value) to a specific column. This ensures that users can query the table, but they will only see the masked data for the protected column, maintaining data governance and privacy.
